name: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Smolsky v. Department of Probation & Parole

parties: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John Jason Talaber, PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
91 A.3d 100
Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 28, 2014.
Raymond J. Smolsky, pro se.
John Jason Talaber, PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
